General.Name: North Copper Shanxi Co Ltd
General.Description: North Copper Co., Ltd. engages in the mining, production, beneficiation, smelting, and sale of copper metal. The company also provides copper cathodes, gold and silver ingots, sponge palladium, and sulfuric acids. It offers its products to power, home appliance, foundry, phosphate fertilizer, and coking industries, as well as downstream gold and silver manufacturers and jewelry processors. In addition, it engages in the production and sale of copper strips; mining, smelting, and sale of non-ferrous metal; slag beneficiation of copper ore; and metrology detection. The company was formerly known as North Copper (Shanxi) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to North Copper Co., Ltd. in September 2022. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Yuncheng, China.
